word:
Bro. Andrews, you have a responsibility to bear in regard to the Health Institute. You should ponder, you should reflect. Frequently the time you occupy in reading is the very best time for you to reflect, and study what must be done to set things in order at the Health Institute and at the Office. My husband takes on these burdens because he sees that the work for these 
                                                                           20
institutions must be done by some one. As others would not lead out, he stepped in the gap and supplied the deficiency.
